Package Controller

Class CustomersAdd

java.lang.Object
Controller.CustomersAdd
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomersAdd extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class for the CustomersAdd screen. This class contains methods to initialize the country and division combo boxes with data from their respective DAO classes. It also contains methods to save a new customer when the user clicks the Save button and to return to the Customers screen when the user clicks the Cancel button.
Author:
Mehdi Rahimi

  • Method Details

    • onActionSave

      void onActionSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      The function checks if the customer information fields are empty, if they are, it will display an error message. If they are not empty, it will add the customer to the database. It will then switch to the Customers screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the FXML file cannot be found.
      SQLException - If the SQL query cannot be executed.

    • onActionCancel

      void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This is the method to switch to the Customers screen when the user clicks the Cancel button.
      Parameters:
      event - the user clicks the Cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException - If the FXML file cannot be found.

    • OnActionCountryCombo

      void OnActionCountryCombo(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      This is the method to set the divisionCombo combo box. It gets the divisionId from the countryCombo combo box and uses it to get the division name from the FirstLevelDivisionDaoImpl class.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the SQL query cannot be executed.

    • onActionDivisionCombo

      void onActionDivisionCombo(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This is the method to set the divisionCombo combo box.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize function is called when the FXML file is loaded. It sets the items of the countryCombo to the list of countries returned by the getAllCountries function of the CountryDaoImpl class.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - This is a resource bundle that contains the resources for the controller.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the FXML file cannot be found.
      SQLException - If the SQL query cannot be executed.
